Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people who need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a device (like a string telephone) used for communication between the two people.
The student can show how sound travels through the string in the device to make communication possible.
The student can represent the idea that the string telephone uses sound to work, based on their design.
The student can use labels or brief notes on the drawing to describe how the string telephone works.
The student can illustrate how using the string telephone helps people communicate over long distances.
